name: Chick Chick Goose (merizkadesigns)
description:
Chick Chick Goose is a game inspired by the origins of the game duck duck goose. You play as a fox. Your goal is to find and capture the goose in a field full of chickens before time runs out, and the Farmer gets you.

Developed with Team WhipIt in GSU Aurora Game Development Club (2020-2021)
